Hydras:

"i don't explain myself, Maxima"replied Hydras "I soon might get an 
important prisioner but I need to keep it in the best cell, even I 
may need build the best of all to keep it there and avoid that the 
prisioner ran away..."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 2/22/03 2:29:27 PM Central Standard Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "I just like to ask you something, Maxima... If you had a worty 
> > prisioner, what kind of cell would you use to keep it..."
> > 
> 
> Her optics watched him. "Where would I keep a 'worthy prisoner'?" 
a bit 
> confused but very curious as to what brought up this question. "I 
try not to 
> presume or guess. What has been done in the past, is lock them in 
a cell, 
> with no special treatment. A prisoner is a prisoner. They deserve 
no better 
> treatment." 
> 
> How she remembered the past when such things were done. Even 
remebering a 
> time when that happened to Starscream, on more than one occassion. 
As well as 
> others. Including Prime.
